Name: Baikonur Cosmodrome
World achievements: The first satellite, Sputnik 1, was launched.

Name: Ohsumi
World achievements: The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight, 1.4m diameter)

Name: Sakigake
World achievements: The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)

Name: Yang Liwei
Asian First: First man in space launched by an Asian space program

Name: Hayabusa
World achievements: The first asteroid ascent, sample return from an asteroid

Name: FY-1C
World achievements: Highest in history with altitude 865 km, also the fastest with speed 18k miles

Name: Japanese Experiment Module
Asian First: Manned foundations in space (STS-123, STS-124, STS-127)
World achievements: The world's largest pressurized volume in space[76]

Name: Tianlian I
Asian First: Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System First TDRS system to support crewed missions

Name: Moon Impact Probe
World achievements: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.[77][78]

Name: IKAROS
World achievements: The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

Name: Chang'e 2
Asian First: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).

Name: Shenzhou 9
Asian First: First crewed space docking by an Asian country (with Tiangong-1)

Name: Chang'e 3/Yutu
Asian First: First lunar soft landing and lunar rover by an Asian country.
World achievements: First lunar soft landing in 21st century

Name: Mars Orbiter Mission
Asian First: First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
World achievements: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt. Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA.

Name: PSLV-C37
Asian First: First to successfully launch and deploy 104 satellites simultaneously from a single rocket (PSLV -C37).[80][81]
World achievements: First country in the world to launch more than 100 satellites at one go.

Name: Chang'e 4
Asian First: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon
World achievements: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon by any country. Landed with Yutu-2 rover.
